long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Random Password Inserter is a convenient and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to generate and insert random, secure passwords directly into text fields. It is perfect for enhancing your online security by avoiding repeated or easy-to-guess passwords. Hereâ€™s why you should install it:

Secure Password Generation: Create complex passwords that include symbols, letters, and digits, ensuring maximum security.
Customizable Settings: Adjust the number of symbols, letters, and digits, as well as the total length of the passwords, to meet your specific needs.
Easy to Use: With a simple right-click context menu option, you can insert a password instantly into any text field.
Auto-Copy Feature: Automatically copy the generated password to your clipboard for easy pasting.
Password History: Keep track of your last three generated passwords for quick access.
Ideal for anyone who wants to enhance their password security without the hassle of manually creating and remembering complex passwords.
